mapper.select: select name, age, address, telephone, qq, weixin, email, sex, birthday from user;
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (name, account, age, passwordencrypt, address, telephone, qq, weixin, email, sex, birthday) value(#{name}, #{account}, #{age}, #{passwordencrypt}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{qq}, #{weixin}, #{email}, #{sex}, #{birthday})
